drop table if exists account; create table account( id int not null auto_increment, user_name varchar(20), password varchar(20), nick_name varchar(20), mobile varchar(11), email varchar(40), gender varchar(2), photo varchar(100), birth_date date, lastLoginTime datetime, createTime datetime, updateTime datetime, userType int, deleted varchar(5), primary key (id) );
create table account
